sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().parameters.DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Pipeline_Name}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}' as RunId,
'@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSystem}' as SourceSystem,
'@{pipeline().parameters.FullRefresh}' as FullRefresh,
'@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}' as SourceSchema,
'@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}' as SourceTable, 
'@{pipeline().parameters.DestinationSchema}' as DestinationSchema,
'@{pipeline().parameters.DestinationTable}' as DestinationTable,
'@{pipeline().parameters.TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().parameters.TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().parameters.TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().parameters.TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{pipeline().parameters.RowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{pipeline().parameters.RowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{pipeline().parameters.No_ParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{pipeline().parameters.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{pipeline().parameters.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Source_Type}' as Source_Type,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Execution_Status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{pipeline().parameters.CopyActivity_Start_Time}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{pipeline().parameters.CopyActivity_End_Time}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{pipeline().parameters.CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,
'@{pipeline().parameters.CopyActivity_preCopyScriptDuration_in_secs}' as CopyActivity_preCopyScriptDuration_in_secs,
'@{pipeline().parameters.CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs
